text: * North East is one of the geopolitical zones of Nigeria, consisting of the following states: ** Adamawa ** Bauchi ** Borno ** Gombe ** Taraba ** Yobe It occupies slightly less than one-third of Nigeria's total area and had a projected population for 2011 of 23,558,674 or 13.5% of the country's population. The inhabitants are mainly Fulani and Kanuri people with more than 100 minority ethnic groups. ==References== Category:Subdivisions of Nigeria
title: North East (Nigeria)
